definition: ups and downs (of life etc)/to drift along/to sink and emerge
affairs of life/things of the world
to rise and fall/takeoff and landing/ups and downs
prosperity and decline (of a kingdom)/rise and fall
lit. a white cloud transforms into what looks like a gray dog (idiom)/fig. the unpredictable changeability of the world
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
lit. the blue sea turned into mulberry fields (idiom)/fig. the transformations of the world
